triples.name: Event-driven architecture
triples.relevance: The paper proposes a dynamic event-triggered control mechanism to reduce communication updates.

triples.name: Multi-agent system
triples.relevance: The paper addresses control problems for systems composed of multiple interacting agents.

triples.name: Delay differential equation
triples.relevance: The paper handles time-varying input delays in multiagent systems using delay compensation techniques.

triples.name: Neural network (machine learning)
triples.relevance: Neural networks are used to approximate system dynamics and enable nonlinear observer and control design.

triples.name: Closed-loop controller
triples.relevance: Output-feedback control is a closed-loop control approach used for state estimation and tracking.

triples.name: Adaptive control
triples.relevance: The paper employs adaptive control techniques to handle uncertain and time-varying system parameters.

triples.name: Consensus dynamics
triples.relevance: Consensus tracking ensures that all agents in the multiagent system reach agreement on a common reference trajectory.

triples.name: Nonlinear control
triples.relevance: The paper addresses control of nonlinear multiagent systems using dynamic surface control techniques.

triples.name: State observer
triples.relevance: A low-gain nonlinear observer is designed to estimate immeasurable states for feedback control.
